summaries.title: Motivations
contents: I want to draw my vision and my dreams
I want to mix art and technology
I love Ultimate Frisbee; I want to run.
I want to make games which are engaging and make people think abstractly

summaries.title: Experiences
contents: Optimizing data storage and data workflow

summaries.title: Quotes
contents: "Ultimate does not develop character, it reveals it"
"When a ball dreams, its dreams its a disc"
"Even if you don't like a person, you should respect the human." - Megha
"Every once in a while the blind squirrel finds the nut."
"Expectations are like fine pottery. The harder you hold them, the more likely they are to crack."
"Write something worth reading, or do something worth writing." - Benjamin Franklin
"If it were easy, everyone would be doing it"
"Programming is our way of encoding thought such that the computer can help us with it." - Chris Granger
"It's not the broken dreams that break us. It's the ones we don't dare to dream" - Will Schuester
"All we have to decide is what to do with the time that is given to us" - Gandalf the Grey
"A bruise is a lesson... and each lesson makes us better." - Arya Stark
"The problem is not the problem. The problem is your attitude about the problem." - Jack Sparrow
"A mind needs books as a sword needs a whetstone if it is to keep its edge" - Tyrion Lannister
"Get busy living or get busy dying." - Andy Dufresne
